course_title: Special Topics in Business - STRAT DECSN MKNG

sections.comments: Full course title: Strategy and Integrated Decision Making  |  Pre-reqs: COMM 390 and COMM 395  |   Learn more at mybcom.sauder.ubc.ca/comm486MCOMM 486M is an integrative capstone course specifically designed to help students prepare at a professional and personal level for the transition from university to their early careers. This course reinforces concepts covered throughout the UBC BCom program and students will tackle complex business and societal issues in various formats, including a live client engagement, a series of live case studies, and interactive in-class exercises.  **Please Note:  COMM 486M registrants are required to attend a full-day, alumni-run workshop on either January 25, 2020 or February 1, 2020 in addition to regularly scheduled classes. Registration instructions for the workshop will be provided at the start of the course.
